CLOSING THREAD

Have a group of dupes I don't need.

I accept payment via PP Friends and Family.  Please add $2 for shipping. 

I will listen to offers but anyone saying "I'll take it" gets the priority over ongoing negotiations.  Would trade for any EPDG's I need. 

All cards are also listed on the bay.
